name: Kodiak Rhode II Waterproof Arctic Grip Insulated Boots - Men's
categories: Rhode II Waterproof Arctic Grip Insulated Boo
description: A bear hug for your feet. Kodiak Rhode II Waterproof Arctic Grip Insulated Boots have a leather upper and waterproof construction to stand tall against water and grit. A padded collar and lace-up closure create a secure and comfortable fit. When it's well below zero, swap hibernation for insulation – 400g of cushioning warmth to be exact. Saunter across packed snow with top-of-the-foodchain confidence supplied by Vibram® Arctic Grip™ outsoles.Full-grain leather upper resists stains from road salt and grime.Felted wool padded collar.Waterproof construction.400gm synthetic insulation provides warmth and comfort down to -30°C.Contoured EVA insole.Vibram® Arctic Grip™ rubber outsole is designed to provide traction on ice and packed snow.Comes with 2 sets of laces.
